items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know if he can do what you\'re asking him to do.
Tom dropped a strawberry on the floor and Mary stepped on it.

You should probably tell Tom why he shouldn\'t be doing that.
You won\'t believe how much money Tom gave me for my old car.
Everything at that store is 10 percent off the regular price.
She advised him not to spend all his money on his girlfriend.
We kept track of all our expenses while we were in Australia.
You should spend a little time each day reviewing vocabulary.
If Tom hadn\'t been sick, I\'m sure he\'d have gone with you.
Tom wants to make sure Mary knows what she\'s supposed to do.
Tom doesn\'t want to get married until he\'s in his thirties.
Tom had no intention of doing anything he didn\'t want to do.
Go to sleep, Tom. You need to wake up early tomorrow morning.

Whenever I lie down on my bed and read a book, I fall asleep.
Would I only work on weekends if I could? Of course, I would.
I thought Tom would be better at playing the flute than that.
I walk across that bridge every morning on the way to school.

About how many hours does it take to get to Boston from here?
All you need to do is remember these three very simple steps.

There is no doubt in my mind that Tom didn\'t commit suicide.

I enforce the rules even though I don\'t agree with them all.

If it hadn\'t been for the storm, I would\'ve arrived sooner.
